message.body: Hey Kurt, I might bring over a space heater tonight after my meeting and dinner. I couldn't bare to see those pipes burst
Hey, thanks Hunter. I appreciate it. You don't have to go out of your way. I'll try to pick one up in the neighborhood. It's a good idea for saving a lot of trouble.
Yeah tonight it's gonna be cold so I would run one by your water meter all night
Looks like I'll be running it though Saturday atleast. Off to get one now.
Also make sure the water to your outdoor spigot is turned off and unscrew the little bleed knob once you close the shut off inside the basement that runs to it
Alright Hunter. That outta do it. Thanks for carefully thinkin through any possible catastrophes.
